title: Retro TV Watch Face
summary: Discount! An interactive watch face for the retro design lover.
description: Retro design, interactive.Just tap to tweak! No pesky menus or managing the watch face with your phone. Now you can have it all! A retro design watch face with customizable styles and interactive features. The Watch TV watch face is for the individual that appreciates elegant design and style. If you are looking for a space age, high tech, robotic watch face, please continue browsing. This watch face is none of that.Watch TV Watch Face has the following features:* Customize the minute and hour hand colors: red, green, blue* Customize the tick colors: white, red, blue, black(off)* Show Battery level: both phone and wear* Show date: FEB 24 WED or WED 24 FEB* Open your agenda* Clean and elegant Ambient Mode designPLEASE NOTE: Interactive watch faces features require the latest version of Android Wear. Will not work on devices running Tizen OS.Missing a color or feature you like? Leave us feedback and we might add it to our next update.
descriptionHTML:
Retro design, interactive.

Just tap to tweak! No pesky menus or managing the watch face with your phone.

Now you can have it all! A retro design watch face with customizable styles and interactive features. The Watch TV watch face is for the individual that appreciates elegant design and style.

If you are looking for a space age, high tech, robotic watch face, please continue browsing. This watch face is none of that.

Watch TV Watch Face has the following features:

* Customize the minute and hour hand colors: red, green, blue
* Customize the tick colors: white, red, blue, black(off)
* Show Battery level: both phone and wear
* Show date: FEB 24 WED or WED 24 FEB
* Open your agenda
* Clean and elegant Ambient Mode design


PLEASE NOTE: Interactive watch faces features require the latest version of Android Wear. Will not work on devices running Tizen OS.

Missing a color or feature you like? Leave us feedback and we might add it to our next update.
